actions.text: Amendment SA 2023 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 2023 proposed by Senator Hirono for Senator Sanders. (consideration: CR S7887; text: CR S7887) Relative to extension of authority for program of referral and counseling services for veterans at risk of homelessness who are transitioning from certain institutions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2023 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2023 proposed by Senator Hirono for Senator Sanders.

purpose: Relative to extension of authority for program of referral and counseling services for veterans at risk of homelessness who are transitioning from certain institutions.
